scripts.test: DEBUG=True nyc --reporter=text env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.testing.json" NODE_ENV="test" mocha --exit -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config -r 'tests/config/hook.ts' 'tests/**/*.spec.ts' --timeout 40000
scripts.test:unit: env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.testing.json" NODE_ENV="test" mocha -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config -r 'tests/config/hook.ts' --timeout 40000 --exit 'tests/unit/**/*.ts'
